content.detailedDescription: I took pictures on the 27th, it was a cloudless day, i caught planet x, and some ufos which i sent to you. on the 28th, i took more pictures, but didn't have time to download into my computer. today the 29th  i snapped 3 pictures and when i got home, i downloaded my cellphone pictures and then enlarged them.  i couldn't believe what i was seeing.  apparently the sun was bouncing off the clouds, and caused these buildings to be seen. they are on both sides of the sun, a couple of the pictures show them up pretty well.  there looks like 2 ships below the sun, and about 3 saucer shaped on the left of the sun.  you will have to look at all the photos because some show better than others.
content.summary: When i enlarge photo there were buildings in the clouds, seriously,look, you will see them

content.detailedDescription: I took pictures on the 27th, it was a cloudless day, i caught planet x, and some ufos which i sent to you. on the 28th, i took more pictures, but didn't have time to download into my computer. today the 29th  i snapped 3 pictures and when i got home, i downloaded my cellphone pictures and then enlarged them.  i couldn't believe what i was seeing.  apparently the sun was bouncing off the clouds, and caused these buildings to be seen. they are on both sides of the sun, a couple of the pictures show them up pretty well.  there looks like 2 ships below the sun, and about 3 saucer shaped on the left of the sun.  you will have to look at all the photos because some show better than others.
content.summary: When i enlarge photo there were buildings in the clouds, seriously,look, you will see them

content.detailedDescription: Object was distant looked big and was stationary
content.summary: Check video attached

content.detailedDescription: The night of june 29, 2017 roughly around 9:30 pm my grandma and i were driving out of downtown phoenix, az. we were down highway 202 and rural road. i looked out the window and saw a very large swarm of hovering twinkling red lights. it looked like there were hundreds of lights in the shapeless swarm and they were packed closely enough that we would tell that they were not attached on the surface of any object. the swarm was high in the air and could be seen several miles away. it was not close to any tall buildings and was much larger than a blimp. we couldn't believe our eyes and couldn't find any explanation for the swarm of lights online or on the news. we lost sight of the swarm as we turned on to the 101. we aren't sure of the lights on the swarm moved at all but they did twinkle slowly. this event happen over a major metropolitan area near a major highway so there must be other witnesses out there.
content.summary: Saw a large swarm of hundreds twinkling red lights over downtown phoenix over buildings. swarm of lights, not attached to object.

content.detailedDescription: I have caught these pictures in the same place 2 days in a row.  i didn't have time yesterday, but i stopped at county market, and upon leaving, took a couple of shots of the sun, like on the 27th.  the pictures i am downloading are over my garage yesterday and over county market today.  shen i got home, i downloaded my pictures from my cell phone.  nothing looked out of the ordinary at first, but when i started enlarging them, i began to see buildings in the clouds on either side of the sun.  it looks to me like with the naked eye, you cant see them and they don't show up on a clear day, but wha i think is happening, the sun is glancing off the clouds which in turn shines on and outline the buildings.  i am downloading the pictures, so go ahead and enlarge them and take a look! i am just flabbergasted at all this.  i think there are a couple of ships setting under the sun also, you will see them too.  i think to the left of the sun is at least 3 saucers,  but it may be my imagination, but i got another person to look at this and i didn't have to point any of it out to her, she started showing me some i had missed. i would love to know if anyone else has caught this on their cameras.
content.summary: City in the sky and possible ufo's

content.detailedDescription: Was in my backyard talking on my cell phone with a friend, when i noticed a diamond shaped object above my neighbors house. the object was silver, shiny reflecting light, had sparkling blinking white lights and was tumbling end over end as it flew over my back yard. although the object was silver when it flew it also seemed to change to a darker silver. there was no sound associated with this object. object was flying from the sw to the ne in a perfect straight line. i watched it fly off into the distance. i watched it for approximately 7 minuets from start to finish.  i live in one of the flight paths for seatac airport and there were jets flying north to south while this object was flying by. the sky was clear blue with a few clouds in the distance. i did take pictures but the object showed as only a dot on my phone.
content.summary: Diamond shaped object with lights flying end over end

content.detailedDescription: We were eating ice cream outside at cold stone creamery when i noticed a fireball in the southeast direction.  i pointed out and was observed by 8 people for about a minute.  i thought it would would go out but it kept going,  it was very bright and looked like something was burning up in the atmosphere.  it must have been far as well because it did not cover much space.  then it split into 5 seperate fireballs and continued downward.  they seperated a little and then started hovering, then they continued down in a irregular pattern, all of them were going in different directions at the same time. i lost site after an additional minute behind the building accross the street. i have never seen anything like that and would like to know if anyone else saw it and if someone know what it could have been.
content.summary: Bright fireball shooting down for about a minute , then seperated into 5 fireballs, then hovered and continued down in irregular pattern

content.detailedDescription: Need both photos i have analized as something is very strange about them. they appear to look exactly the same but have a 30 day difference and taken from differrant areas of my back yard.
content.summary: Object photographed twice in a 30 day period

content.detailedDescription: Standing in driveway in sanford, nc.  approx 0440 am. smoking a cigar and drinking coffee. alert and awake.  i always enjoy watching night sky. looking to the east over raleigh. nc, saw a circular aura, like the moonlight tryining to come through a cloudy sky, though that was odd, since moon was setting to west, and too early for sunrise. even thought to myself should get my camera... the aura brightened, the 3 lights appeared below the aura. the three lights became super bright and disappeared leaving what appeard to be cloudy auras. this occured twice with a three light pattern. it was quite visible and intense, i would think rdu airport would have picked up something....
content.summary: Circular aura  in clear sky, orb brightened, then 3 lights appear below bright in shy, became extremely bright then disappeared. occurred twice

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were outside talking at around 4:30 am, and i saw a light grow into a orange fuzzy sphere that was growing. we watched for a couple of minutes as 4 lights forming a square shape appeared a slight distance underneath the sphere and a few more appeared above and/or to the side of the sphere. the lights disappeared and the orange sphere turned into a dark blueish color for a moment. the light turned back orange and the other lights re-appeared and all flashed. a cloud formed around all of the lights, looked as if it was the body of a rocket but built differently. we tried to record on our phones or take pictures but there wasn't enough light so we just watched hoping something crazier would happen. the cloud stayed its shape for another few minutes until fading away into the sky. we were by an airport but at the time there were no planes or helicopters and no other clouds in sight.
content.summary: Orange sphere appeared, lights beneathe and above appeared and flashed for a few moments, outline turned to dark cloud until fading away

content.detailedDescription: I was behind my townhouse on top of a berm walking my dog at 4:30 am.  i had been up for almost 1 hour.  as we were walking i noticed a brightening in the eastern sky that was fairly high up.  there were no clouds in the sky and the stars were clearly visible. the temperature was about 65 degrees with no wind. venus was low in the sky and there was an airplane also in the area.  this light was much higher up and to the left of venus.  it continued to get brighter and larger and looked like a cloud or fog. it had a general round shape. as it got larger a smaller object in the lower right corner showed through.  the only way to explain is it looked like a flashlight shining through the fog.  it was all very large.  much larger than a full moon. it was stationary and not moving in any direction.  it stayed there for a few minutes and started to slowly fade. suddenly directly below this cloud 4 perfectly round yellowish objects appeared in a diamond pattern.  they appeared all at once like someone put a stamp on a piece of paper.  these stayed stationary for a minute or so and started to fade.  then directly below them another complete set of exactly the same pattern appeared.  this happened a third time as the second set started to fade.  however, the third set seemed much smaller, like they were much further away.  all of the objects in the diamond pattern looked like they had a halo around them.  finally all the lights faded away, but the cloud like substance and halo around the objects took much longer and looked just like fog or smoke waiting to be blown away. it just hung in the air.  i did not have my phone with me to take pictures. i believe it happened in a total of 5-7 minutes. it was a truly bizarre experience. i have no idea what it was that i saw. the airplane in the area must have been able to see the same thing i did and there is an interstate highway approximately 1/2 to 3/4 mile from where i was standing.
content.summary: Cloud appeared with what looked like a light shining through it.  4 objects appeared below in a diamond pattern twice then faded away

content.detailedDescription: Was in yard it was not dark yet & saw a very large bright, 'orange like fire' cigar shaped object. it then  started moving toward me. i could not tell how far it was from me. cell phones don't work here so mine was not turned on & in the house. i just watched it until it got into hill & tree line that blocked my vision. i got scared & went into house. we live in a wooded, mountainous area. i thought maybe a helicopter with sun shining off it at 1st, but it was so bright, large & made no noise at all.
content.summary: Right at dusk, saw a large cigar shaped very bright object.

content.detailedDescription:
Five years ago i and my three friends were watching the movie on the wall of my house. after show we had laying on the blankets and talking. our team- no drugs, no mental disorders, etc. 

during the conversation we were looking at the dark, night sky, and suddenly we saw real, the most stereotype ufo with orange colour around disc. everybody shouted up. some seconds of trying to understand what's going on. then "omg you see this????" etc. shock. 
ufo flew away. it was quite slow, after few second accelerated and disappeared behind neighbor house. 

four witnesses. we even didn't know if we should fear or be happy. everybody remember it in the same way till today. we don't know if creatures / humanoids / something from another planets exist, or was it a military. that's only what we saw.

in otwock (25 km from warsaw) some people claim they saw ufo, especially in my area. i also had seen some strange things on the sky, but never ever so... real.
content.summary: Orange disc / circle-thing

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were out for a walk on the ajax waterfront trail at 8:10 p.M. on saturday, june 24, 2017 when i noticed a faint rainbow in the distance and tried to photograph it. i pulled out my cell phone and took two photos. it was very bright out - the sun blinding, and i couldn't really see my screen very well, so i just put it back in my purse without reviewing the pictures.  

on monday, june 26th, i was flipping through my photos, and i finally looked at the photos in question. the rainbow was barely visible, but upon zooming in, i noticed a perfectly spherical cloud with what appeared to be lights inside it on the left hand side of the picture.  i checked the second photo to find the same spherical cloud. 

both photos were taken at the same time within seconds of each other, however, when you compare them, the sphere is lower in the first picture, and has 6 lights visible, and higher in the second picture with only 4 lights visible.
content.summary: Took a picture of the sunset and later noticed spherical cloud with lights inside

content.detailedDescription:
My cousin garry and i have witnessed several instances with the entities living behind us. 
the first few times we both witnessed a form of 2 glowing lighys in our bedroom.
then i delaine, witnessed an entity who looked female who was with a smaller form of herself only the smaller female had blond hair the bigger one had dark hair. i observed them sit down in thier backyard and as i looked over the wall i watched the two disappear and reappear several times. this really blew my mind,
both my cousin and i witnessed this same female, the bigger one, hover through the room towards the back door of thier house. when she came outside we saw she had with her a huge wolf type entity with her. the wolf appeared to be gentle and well groomed. it's hair was neatly combed and it wore a tie and vest. i then said omg.....We mean you no harm. my cousin and i went back inside our house and began to discuss what we had seen.
we've seen other strange events happen at this same location.
content.summary: My cousin and i witnessed entities in the backyard behind my backyard. they looked strange and they disappeared and reappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside taking out the garbage. as i was walking back to the house, i looked up and saw this object in the distance. it moved around in a twitchy manner. i snapped a 2nd picture right after but it had already moved over a little out of frame. it moved around for about a minute and then it took off. there was no noise and i am at a loss of what that could have been.
content.summary: I was outside taking out the garbage. as i was walking back to the house, i looked up and saw this object in the distance. it moved around in a twitchy manner. i snapped a 2nd picture right after but it had already moved over a little out of frame. it mov

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i returned to our beach house in avalon, nj, after dinner on saturday, june 24.Our address there is 3664 dune drive, two blocks from the ocean. when i got out of the car, i looked up at the sky and saw three objects the size of a bright planet flying from sw to ne, headed out over the ocean. they were in formation, and did not change positions relative to one another. they flew rather slowly -- these were not streaks of light.  several seconds later, four more identical objects, also in formation, flew over. then, more objects flew over, one-by-one. they kept coming until we finally counted a total of 15. they were almost directly overhead -- it's hard to say what angle. they flew straight, did not wobble, ascend or descend, and they were silent. nothing about them suggested they might be airplanes or helicopters. no noise, strobe lights, etc. i checked my watch when we saw the first group of three, and it was 10:12 p.M. the entire episode lasted a few minutes. 

we were baffled by what we saw. we know that dover air force base is situated in delaware, southwest of avalon. the objects might have originated there.  i called the coast guard station in cape may, nj and reported what happened. they asked many questions, and said they would call back, which they never did. when i related this event to our son, he suggested that send a report to your organization.
content.summary: Saw 15 lights flying overhead from sw to ne headed over atlantic ocean. no noise.

content.detailedDescription: I was having a dream of being pulled through ceiling and my fiance woke and cried out where are you going and i responded in my dream that i would return. upon waking the next morning she told me of a strange dream she had. it was exactly as i remembered my dream from the same night. since then ive woken with several cuts on my head and what appears to be needle injections into stomach. ive also notice i have a gift id rather not discuss at this time. the best way to discribe is desernment of sprit. as if i know when something is going to happen before hand. i understand this is strange and both of us decided to keep to ourselves until i started watching your information. i am a engineer and she is a scool teacher. we cannot take unnessary chances. thank you
content.summary: I was pulled through ceiling and my fiance withnessed this and i told her during event id be back

content.detailedDescription: Looked up in the sky an saw a large green orb, looked like a cloud covering the moon kinda an the light shining from around the cloud. all of sudden second orb appears. than 2 more. than 4 more. all lined up prefectly??!! than, even weirder, saw a shooting star pass thorugh it as it was happening.
content.summary: Multiplying glowing lights in sky. very large, changing colors, lights slowly turned to a cloudlike structure

content.detailedDescription:
I am a formed law enforcement official (retired) and former military with service in usmc air wing vmcj-1, vmcj-2, vmcj-3.

at about 0415 hours on 6/29/2017 i went outside with my dog on a leash to let him get his morning bathroom break.  the temperature was 55 degrees fahrenheit, the sky was clear and stars were visible, very few clouds in the sky.  while standing at the end of my driveway i looked up at the sky and stars.  i noticed a quite unusual sight in the east-southeast portion of the sky.  there were four cloud like spherical shapes in a perfect rectangle with the cloud spheres positioned at the four corners of the formed rectangle.  i thought this to be most unusual...I watched for a short time and thought that i should go back inside and get my cell phone to see if i could get a photo of this but i just stood there observing these spheres when suddenly just below the 4 cloud like spheres four star bright points of light appeared in a perfect rectangle..The points of light were visible for about 10-15 seconds and the light went out and 4 additional cloud like spheres appeared in their place.
now there were eight cloud like spheres each in a perfect rectangle shape.  very strange.  
i continued to watch and noted that the cloud like spheres were starting to fade away after about thirty to forty seconds.  strange because the original four cloud like spheres held their shape for several minutes without fading away.  it was only after the second set of spheres appeared that all eight spheres faded away at the same rate.
the objects appeared at about 60 degrees above horizon and about 12 degrees se of due east.
perhaps nothing but it was so unusual that i took the time to document this for you in case you have had similar reports.
i was back inside my house at 0436 hours so this observation occurred between 0415-0436 hours 29 june 2017.
the size of the spherical clouds can best be described as softball to cantaloupe in distant sky.
content.summary: Observed 4 cloud like spheres in retangler orientation.  unusual, watched them for a minute or two then four pinpoint starlike lights appeared for about 10 seconds then disappeared and another set of 4 cloud like spheres appeared. s

content.detailedDescription:
0750 june 28th 2017
traveling west down church street (county road 22) towards county road 10 just south west of picton ontario at approximately 60km/h. passed the airport and descending down the escarpment (traveling west) when an unidentified craft was spotted above. it seemed to be traveling south-east from the north-west, slowly, and approximately 50-60 degrees above the horizon and stood out against the blue sky. the size at this point was the size of a canadian quarter (2.3cm/0.93" diameter) held at arm's length. no sound was heard during the whole experience nor was any electrical/mechanical problems experienced. i slowed and pulled to the side of the road while maintaining visual contact with the object while i attempted to get my phone to take a photo. in my haste (as well as a jungle of aux and charging cables) i dropped the phone and when i got it the unidentified had already passed over the horizon. i thought it might have been an super ultralight aircraft flying into the airport but i have seen hundreds of aircraft land there and never seen any sort of configuration in such a way as this, nor was there any sound. frankly i don't even remember ever seeing any sort of aircraft land at the airport this early in the day. the majority (at least 95%) of the aircraft that land at this small airport are cessna 172 and piper cub aircraft and i have seen plenty of those and it was certainly not that. the only helicopter seen in the area that remotely has the same configuration as what i saw is a ch-47 chinook and those you can hear for miles. i live in trenton ontario which is home to 8th wing of the rcaf and my mother was in the air force and i have grown up learning about planes and i am certain it was not a plane or a helicopter. the only other thing i can think of it was being is possibly a balloon drone and that seems unlikely given the time and place of the sighting as well as having to be operated so close to the air field. eyes on object at this point was approximately 5 seconds as it traveled across my field of view and disappeared past the trees. there seemed to be a light, albeit a somewhat opaque or dull light emanating from the two circles below the main "disk" of the craft. my reaction both during and after was more of excitement than fear, though slight nausea was experienced for a few hours following, though it may have been due to too much chinese food the night before.
content.summary: Ufo seen west of picton ontario moving slowly with lights

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the porch with a friend & saw a strange orb thing in the sky & told her to look she said maybe it's the moon, & she told me to take a picture. so i took a picture with flash & 2 more appeared, then i took another picture & more appeared each time i took a picture with my flash. & then a star like light appeared so i tried taking pictures with flash to see if it did it again & it got brighter with each picture then eventually disappeared & to remind you it was the only star in the sky that appeared after the orbs disappeared.
content.summary: Was sitting on the porch saw a weird light & so i took a picture with flash & more orbs appeared

content.detailedDescription: while walking at 4:30 am i noticed a bright light which quickly changed to a bank of smoke. this was immediately followed by four lights and a square pattern which also then turned to smoke with her then followed by four more lights in a square pattern which turns a smoke. a large column of smoke could be seen in the night sky
content.summary: One bright light that went away left a bank of smoke followed by two sets of four lights which also turned  to smoke

content.detailedDescription: There were four of us, all good friends. earlier in the day, we read about a meteor shower online so we wanted to watch it from the lake where we thought we would get the best view of the shower. it was late when we got on our paddle boards, roughly 230 am. we were enjoying ourselves when we noticed what appeared to be a bright flashlight heading our direction. we all wondered who it was or what it was that was approaching. i thought it was the land owner walking out to tell us to turn our music down. as the light approached to about 20 yards or so away, the light seemed to multiply or expand into the brightest, most piercing whitish-blue light. the last thing i remember is having my hair raise on the back of my neck and trying to scream and then the light engulfed us. the next thing i knew was that i was standing on the beach near where we had put our boards in the water. everything around me was distorted even though i was on the beach i was the same beach i had always been on. i thought for a second that i was dead. then one after another, my girlfriend and two friend appeared on shore but everything still wasn't quite right. the only way i can describe what i was seeing was distortion. it was like whoever took us was trying to dial our frequencies back into our dimension or something. i call them extra dimensional entities because they were able to warp the physical reality that we are living in. it's really hard to describe what i was seeing without sounding like a lunatic. just when i was sure i was dead, because there was no way what i was seeing was actually happening, the distortion faded. everything around us just settled down like they had found the right frequency setting for our reality. we all got together, group hugged and cried for several minutes. our paddle boards were still floating out in the lake and our swim suits were only slightly damp. almost dry which indicated to us that we had been out of the water long enough to go from soaking wet to almost competely dry. that gap of time from when we were taken to when we were put back is totally blank from all of our memories. we were taken but have no clue what they did to us. all that we could be thankful for was that we were put back without really being physically harmed that we know of. the experience definitely mentally and emotionally harmed us but i was at least thankful i was alive.
content.summary: Four of us were taken by extra-dimensional or extra terrestrials while lying on our paddle boards watching a meteor shower on august 13

content.detailedDescription: Clear night very bright non-flashing red light going from north to south moving approximately twice as fast as the usual satellites that my wife and i see at night, as we sit out on our deck watching for them. we general see from two to three each night. also, the red light was much brighter than the brightest planet. even brighter than the space station. really couldn’t estimate the altitude though. the night before, we witnessed what looked like a close call of a meteor and a satellite. we were watching the satellite when a meteor flashed right in front of it. a millisecond apart. of course we couldn’t estimate the difference in altitude between the two. it was just something that we had never seen before.
content.summary: Very bright non-flashing red light going from north to south

content.detailedDescription: I was walking back from my cousins house a couple apartments over and while i was outside i seen a bright star like object towards the west,  i was just talking about how i need a good camera since i see frequent things in the sky but said how i found out its the law to report a sighting, lol gonna take a while to do all that because ive seen more then i can say in one sighting report but as i left is when i seen the star like object rising like the sun would if the video was rapidly sped up of the sun rising but in the west getting brighter too then it just stopped i pulled out my phone and recordedthe scene,  i have 54 seconds of this light about 25 seconds in the light disapears out of sight and there was now a blinking light to no light,  this objust while fully lit was as bright as the brightest star in the sky that night which was in view,  i went inside to tell my cousin and then what i recorded its legit from my phone camera,  i see stuff all the time and need a camera that can film the bettwr stuff so its not always a bright flashy light having ti move around ya know,  i see thus stuff alot i bet i could do a live recording if soneone has a camera,  we can shoot something first to prove they will come out,  the more random the even t the better,  i got things that will blow ur mind,  straight gamer changer right here
content.summary: Went to friends seen light in the west as bright as the brightest start in the sky rise and stop phone filmed

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i are camping in the us national forest, land between the lakes. we have a small backcountry site, void of lights and people. the surroundings are dense old growth forest. it lies within a valley- wooded hills surround the campsite; you can barely see the sky beneath the tree line during the day. 

we were laying in our tent, with the rain fly off. we had no fire going, there are no street lights or similar illuminary objects. at the same moment we were alarmed when we noticed a bright red to orange orb manifest approximately 200 ft from us. it, at first, resembled an old rail road lantern. it gave off rays, as if it were contained in glass. it quickly came forward, passing through trees, making its way towards us, i'd say around five miles per hour. it grew larger as it approached. my wife began to scream. then it stopped, as if it was reacting to her. by this time, it was about the size of a beach ball. it stopped, hovered for about five seconds, and then, it is difficult to explain, but it appeared to "flame out" it simply went up into a quick flame, and it was gone. i immediately shined my flashlight, and nothing was there. my wife cried until she convinced me to take us to a hotel. 

the experience was unnerving. i didn't feel any emotion asides what one would feel when seeing such an event. therr was no gloomy or dreadful feeling. but the manifestation was more than enough to frighten my spouse. the most terrifying part of the experience was when it went up in a burst of flames.
content.summary: Flaming ball/orb manicested.

content.detailedDescription: I had been outside with my wife smoking a cigarette and listening to the police scanner on my phone when a strange pulsing sound began coming from the phone speakers. i turned off the application in order to restart it, thinking the app messed up. even with the app turned off the pulsing sound continued to emit from my phone. my wife then stated she heard a rumbling sound (i didn't hear anything other than the pulse from the phone). we looked up in the sky for the source of the rumble and at first saw an airplane on normal flight pattern (we live between an airport and hospital, so have become quite informed of aircraft and helicopter flight patterns in the area). as we were watching the airplane fly from south to north we noticed an object moving west to east, lower than the airplane and at a faster rate of speed. the object had 2 white, 1 red, and 1 yellow lights on it in a triangular pattern. at first the white lights were stationary with the red and yellow lights flashing rapidly. once it moved over our house and more east the yellow light went out and the white lights started flashing on and off in an alternating pattern to the red light that was still flashing. all of a sudden it turned very fast and began heading back west again. we watched it travel west until it was out of view. once it was out of view the pulsing noise on my phone stopped. at this point i noticed another object that appeared to be of the same kind coming from the northwest. it too alternated the same light pattern. as i was watching this my wife observed yet another object hovering to the south. again same triangular shape and same light patterns. as we continued to watch the hovering object 3 more appeared, one right after the other, going from east to west, silently and at a fast pace. we watched the 3 move west until they seemed to blink out and were no longer visible. we then looked back to the one that was hovering and it blinked out also. there were multiple people in the area letting off fireworks and the objects seemed to appear when the fireworks started and then were gone about 5 minutes or so after the fireworks stopped, so unsure if that had any connection to the objects or not.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4 objects emitting patterned red/white/yellow lights

content.detailedDescription:
This situation does not involve an actual object but instead a strange occurrence involving unusual events. 
late one night i was out with friends at a local hot spot. i began a random conversation with a table of three young guys. the conversation took a turn when i felt a "skinny light saber" like object in my hand. i raised it to the sky and felt a beam shoot out to the stars. after waving it around in no particular motion i had my sight replaced with a split view of three different galaxies and random movies began to replace my thoughts. 
the tree galaxies were different from one another but i remember one was very balanced with equal arms and very few stars that too were equal in size and distance apart.
content.summary: No ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to drop off my 7 year old son at summer school.  as i turned north, i noticed an object in the sky and told my son as he loves to see airplanes in sky.  as we traveled toward it, we both realized it did not appear to be a plane or a helicopter, but could not determine what it could be.  what i found odd was it was not moving in any direction.  as i approached the stop light, i decided to open car window and take  picture with my cell phone.  i zoomed as much as my phone would allow me.  we continued traveling north about a mile and a half and then turned right toward his school.  once we arrived at his school, we got off car and looked back toward same direction and to see if object was still there and notice a jet had left a smoke trail.  i told my son oh that was probably what it was. as we looked toward the end of the smoke trail we noticed object once again.  by this point the receptionist at my sons school came outside and wondered what we were looking at.  we explained what we were looking at.  she finally saw the object we were looking at and all of sudden it disappeared and she said, where did it go?  about 5 seconds later it reappeared she said that's strange.  it was very strange how it disappeared and reappeared.
content.summary: Object was quite high and was stationary and occasionally a red light blinked
